text: @TexasTribune @GovAbbott He just keeps talking about all the open bed capacity in hospitals as if it’s no big deal since there’s ample room for people to be hospitalized. I guess that’s what happens when your COVID-19 response panel is made up ofcampaign donors who value their own wallets over our lives.
